line.comment: * Task 0.
* Protects non-border reachable sectors, giving priority to enemy-claimed sectors, then hot sectors, then random sectors.
* Zero Hour allows it to also go into border sectors on default.
* during the global alliance strong Rearguard squadrons go hunt OCV. Weak Rearguards support strong ones together with Task Forces
* do if [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.Squadron.SwitchLeaderIfNeeded' : squadron=[THIS]
* continue
* if you are in a Xenon sector right now you can wreck it!
* we are a strong OCV hunter fleet and search for large Terraformer ships
* first try up to 4 jumps from our current location (here we don't tether to the homebase because we want them to be able to roam the entire galaxy)
* we cannot approach the general area around the Portal until we got clearance by UNC command
* once we are done with the local Terraformers we check if any other hunter groups are here
* we don't want to cluster up with other hunter groups. So go to a random unclaimed Xenon sector and finish it while you're there
* we can switch back to the short range search method
* if we couldn't find capships even with double search radius we must go to the closest Xenon sector and search again.
* also 50/50 chance to move randomly before even using double search radius
* before special CIs have not secured the OCV portal we cannot approach the general area around it
* if the closest Xenon sector is less than 8 jumps away from us or too close to the portal we can go a bit further to spread all hunter groups out a bit more.
* before special CIs have not secured the OCV portal we cannot approach the general area around it
* if you couldn't find any Xenon sector to go to (should practically never happen) then you can head home for now
* end
* if we didn't move randomly and also couldn't find capships within 4 jumps we double our search radius
* we are NO Hunter ourself so we have to join the closest one (can be from another faction)
* Zero Hour defense strategy adjustments
* do if [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.IsBorder' : sector=$sector
* continue
* do if [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.IsBlacklisted' : race=[OWNER] item=$sector
* continue
* if we didn't find a secondary threat sector we can still help in the nearby faction war
* Pirate base.
* only during Xenon Crisis! When you are a OCV hunter group and happen to end up in a Xenon sector you can also clear it while you're there
* but we claim it for a random main faction!!!

line.text: 'Joint UNC forces have gifted the sector '

line.comment: * its irrelevant if we could claim the sector or not. We still destroy the Xenon station

Zero Hour allows it to also go into border sectors on default.

we cannot approach the general area around the Portal until we got clearance by UNC command

we don't want to cluster up with other hunter groups. So go to a random unclaimed Xenon sector and finish it while you're there

if you couldn't find any Xenon sector to go to (should practically never happen) then you can head home for now
if we didn't move randomly and also couldn't find capships within 4 jumps we double our search radius
we are NO Hunter ourself so we have to join the closest one (can be from another faction)
Zero Hour defense strategy adjustments
do if [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.IsBorder' : sector=$sector
do if [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.IsBlacklisted' : race=[OWNER] item=$sector
if we didn't find a secondary threat sector we can still help in the nearby faction war
Pirate base.
only during Xenon Crisis! When you are a OCV hunter group and happen to end up in a Xenon sector you can also clear it while you're there
but we claim it for a random main faction!!!
its irrelevant if we could claim the sector or not. We still destroy the Xenon station
